statements.query: MATCH (:CloudanixWorkspace{id: $WORKSPACE_ID})-[:OWNER]->(:BitbucketWorkspace{uuid: $WORKSPACE_UUID})<-[:RESOURCE]-(:BitbucketProject)<-[:REPOSITORY]-(:BitbucketRepository)-[:BRANCH]->(n:BitbucketBranch) WHERE n.lastupdated <> $UPDATE_TAG WITH n LIMIT $LIMIT_SIZE DETACH DELETE (n) return COUNT(*) as TotalCompleted

MATCH  (n:BitbucketRepository)-[:REPOSITORY]->(:BitbucketProject)<-[:RESOURCE]-(:BitbucketWorkspace{uuid: $WORKSPACE_UUID})<-[:OWNER]-(:CloudanixWorkspace{id: $WORKSPACE_ID})  WHERE n.lastupdated <> $UPDATE_TAG WITH n LIMIT $LIMIT_SIZE DETACH DELETE (n) return COUNT(*) as TotalCompleted

MATCH (:BitbucketRepository)-[r:REPOSITORY]->(:BitbucketProject)<-[:RESOURCE]-(:BitbucketWorkspace{uuid: $WORKSPACE_UUID})<-[:OWNER]-(:CloudanixWorkspace{id: $WORKSPACE_ID}) WHERE r.lastupdated <> $UPDATE_TAG WITH r LIMIT $LIMIT_SIZE DELETE (r) return COUNT(*) as TotalCompleted
